title: File Processing Example
description: Demonstrates recipe features: text steps, user prompts, file dialogs, and error handling

statement: Welcome to the ASH Example Recipe! This will demonstrate the key features of the system.
Step 1: This is a simple text-only step. No Python function needed - just press Enter to continue.
Step 2: Now we'll prompt you for some information.

prompt_for.name: What's your name?
prompt_for.project: What project are you working on?

statement: Step 3: Let's open a file dialog to select a file (or cancel if you prefer).
Step 4: This step will demonstrate error handling - it will fail the first time so you can see retry logic.
Step 5: Finally, we'll show a summary of what happened.
Congratulations! You've completed the ASH example recipe. Check out the recipes/ folder for more examples, or create your own!
